Rulings.Edison: ●If this card is sent to the GY by the effect of Destiny Hero - Diamond Dude, even if you have no cards on your side of the field and in your hand when its effect is activated during your next Main Phase, you can only draw 2 cards. The extra draw effect only applies when you activate the card Fifth Hope itself, not just its effect.
